author: 0xraino
content: <@!543900561460822016> <@!211091239112671234> , I've been thinking about the testing for EIP-2930

author: 0xraino
content: Will a new json field need to be added to the transactions in the reference tests?

author: 0xraino
content: Is there any behavior of 2930 that couldn't be covered by the reference tests (besides the wire representation of the transactions)?

author: dimitry8570
content: New field will be required for the tests. But the field is optional so its backwards compatible

author: dimitry8570
content: And t8ntool would need a support
